translated: tongue element, taste element, tongue consciousness element, body element, tactile element, body consciousness element, thinking element, dharma element, or thinking consciousness element is diligent🔽or that it is not diligent.🔽Similarly, he does not consider that suffering is diligent

analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya @362b bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽de bzhin du ma rig pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du ma rig pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, he does not consider that he is striving or not striving in relation to the arising of suffering, the cessation of suffering, or the path.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in relation to ignorance.

original: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in relation to formative predispositions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, sensation, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death.

original: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that he is striving or not striving in relation to the perfection of generosity,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who is thus diligent is said to be diligent in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,🔽Moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who is diligent in the perfection of wisdom does not consider whether physical forms are permanent or impermanent.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are permanent or impermanent.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are imbued with happiness or suffering.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are imbued with happiness or suffering.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether physical forms are imbued with self or non-self.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are imbued with self or non-self.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are empty or not empty.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are empty or not empty.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are with signs or signless.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are with signs or signless.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether physical forms are calm or not calm.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are calm or not calm.

original: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: He does not consider whether physical forms are void or not void.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are void or not void.

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether physical forms are afflicted or purified.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are afflicted or purified.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are generated or terminated.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are generated or terminated.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are enshrouded or revealed.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are enshrouded or revealed.🔽He does not consider whether physical forms are near or far.🔽Similarly, he does not consider whether feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are near or far.

analyzed: 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he does not see the past, future, and present as real.

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: In the same way, he does not connect or separate the form element and the eye-consciousness element, the ear element, the sound element, and the ear-consciousness element, the nose element, the smell element, and the nose-consciousness element,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sngon gyi mtha' dang /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sngon gyi mtha' dang /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue-consciousness element, the body element, the tangible element, and the body-consciousness element, the thinking-mind element, the dharma element, and the thinking-mind-consciousness element with the past, future, and present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe @367b na; 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe @367b na; 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is it so? Because he does not see the past, the future, and the present.

original: snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang rgya cher sbyar ro //
analyzed: snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang rgya cher sbyar ro //
translated: Just as with the past, the future, and the present, so it is with the four noble truths.

original: de bzhin du ma rig pa nas /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma rig pa nas / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, he does not connect or separate ignorance from the past, the future, and the present.

original: rga shi'i bar dang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar dang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: Similarly, he does not connect or separate from the past, the future, and the present, up to and including aging and death.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he does not see the past, the future, and the present.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice in this way, it is said that they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: Noble One Hundred Thousand Line Perfection of Wisdom

original: bam po bzhi pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi pa /
translated: Scroll Four

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva mahāsattva who is diligent in the perfection of wisdom does not connect form with omniscience and does not separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not see form itself.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: Similarly, they do not connect feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness with omniscience and do not separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des rnam par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //🔽de bzhin du mig dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor @368a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar des rnam par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro // de bzhin du mig dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor @368a *//
translated: Because they do not see consciousness itself.

original: mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mi 'byed do //
translated: Similarly, they do not connect the eyes with omniscience and do not separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des mig nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des mig nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not see the eye.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, they do not connect the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind with the knowledge of all aspects, nor do they disconnect them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar des yid nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des yid nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, they do not connect sights with the knowledge of all aspects, nor do they disconnect them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar des gzugs rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des gzugs rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because they do not see sights.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, they do not connect sounds, smells, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena with the knowledge of all aspects, nor do they disconnect them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar des chos rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des chos rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, he does not join the eye constituent and the form constituent and the eye consciousness constituent to the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: 'di ltar des mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

translated: In the same way, he does not join the ear constituent and the sound constituent and the ear consciousness constituent to the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang @368b dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, he does not join the nose constituent and the smell constituent and the nose consciousness constituent to the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

translated: Similarly, he does not join the element of the tongue, the element of tastes, and the element of gustatory consciousness to the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: Similarly, he does not join the element of the body, the element of touchables, and the element of tactile consciousness to the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

translated: In the same way, he does not connect the mind element and the entity element and the mind consciousness element with the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he disconnect them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: 'di ltar des yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: In the same way, he does not connect the truth of suffering with the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he disconnect it.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyid yang dag @369a *//

analyzed: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

analyzed: 'di ltar des ma rig pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro // de bzhin du rga shi'i bar dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //

original: zhes de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, he does not connect or separate up to old age and death and the knowledge of all modes.🔽And so on.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: And why?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

translated: further, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽does not see form as really joining with feeling.🔽He does not see feeling as really joining with perception.

analyzed: sna ni lce dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the nose as being associated with the tongue.

original: lce ni lus dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce ni lus dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: lus ni yid dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus ni yid dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
