analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du gzugs rnams ni sgra dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du @370a *// par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Because it is empty of an intrinsic nature, and a dharma does not unite with itself.🔽In the same way, he does not see forms as being in union with sounds.

original: de bzhin du sgra rnams ni dri dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dri rnams ni ro dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra rnams ni dri dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dri rnams ni ro dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see sounds as being in union with smells.🔽He does not see smells as being in union with tastes.

original: ro rnams ni reg pa dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ro rnams ni reg pa dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see tastes as being in union with tangibles.🔽He does not see tangibles as being in union with dharmas.

original: reg pa rnams ni chos rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: reg pa rnams ni chos rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see contact as associated with the dharmas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because no dharma is associated with any dharma, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa de bzhin du khams rnams la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //🔽de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa de bzhin du khams rnams la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o // de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni /
translated: And so on at length.🔽And so on as before with the other truths.

original: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni /🔽'gog pa'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the truth of suffering as associated with the truth of the arising of suffering.

original: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni /
translated: He does not see the truth of the arising of suffering as associated with the truth of the cessation of suffering.🔽He does not see the truth of the cessation of suffering as associated with the truth of the path.🔽He does not see the truth of the path as associated with the truth of the cessation of suffering.

original: lam gyi bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider the truth of the path to be truly existent in combination with the truth of the path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par @370b 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par @370b 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No dharma can be truly existent in combination with another dharma.

original: de bzhin du ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Similarly, he does not consider ignorance to be truly existent in combination with the formative predispositions.

original: de bzhin du rga shi'i bar du'ang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rga shi'i bar du'ang sbyar ro //
translated: The same refrain should be applied up to and including aging and death.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No dharma can be truly existent in combination with another dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of physical forms is not physical forms.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su mi byed do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su mi byed do //
translated: the emptiness of form does not make form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor bar mi byed do //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of feeling does not make feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of perception does not make perception.

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of volitional factors does not make volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes par mi byed do //
translated: The emptiness of consciousness does not make consciousness.

original: de bzhin du mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the eyes is not the eyes.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind is not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind.

original: de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnams ma yin no //
translated: The emptiness of forms is not forms.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams @371a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams @371a *//
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena is not sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.

original: kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no //
translated: The emptiness of the eye constituent is not the eye constituent.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the form constituent and the eye consciousness constituent is not the eye consciousness constituent.🔽The emptiness of the ear constituent is not the ear constituent.

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the sound constituent and the ear consciousness constituent is not the ear consciousness constituent.

original: de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the element of nose, the element of smell, and the element of nose-consciousness is not the element of nose-consciousness.

original: de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the element of tongue, the element of taste, and the element of tongue-consciousness is not the element of tongue-consciousness.

original: de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the element of body, the element of touch, and the element of body-consciousness is not the element of body-consciousness.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the element of thought, the element of mental objects, and the element of mind-consciousness is not the element of mind-consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the truth of suffering is not suffering.

original: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i @371b bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i @371b bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the truth of the origin is not the origin.

original: de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gog pa ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the truth of cessation is not cessation.

original: de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of the truth of the path is not the path.

original: de bzhin du ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Extending this in the same way,

original: rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i bar du ma yin no //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i bar du ma yin no //
translated: the emptiness of aging and death is not aging and death.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzugs kyang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzugs kyang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽form is not one thing and emptiness another;

original: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: emptiness is not one thing and form another.

original: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Form itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la; stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la; stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are not other than emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /🔽rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is not other than them.🔽Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa'o //🔽de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa'o // de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la /
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, the eyes are not other than emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /🔽mig kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽mig nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la / mig kyang gzhan ma yin te / mig nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is not other than them.🔽The eyes themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid mig go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid mig go /
translated: Emptiness itself is the eyes.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind are not other than emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /🔽yid kyang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la / yid kyang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: and emptiness is not other than them.

original: yid nyid stong @372a *//
analyzed: yid nyid stong @372a *//
translated: The mind itself is emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the mind.

original: pa nyid do //
analyzed: pa nyid do //
translated: It is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid yid do //
translated: Emptiness is mind.

original: de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, forms are not one thing,🔽and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: emptiness is not one thing,

original: gzugs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽gzugs rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te / gzugs rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and forms another.🔽Forms are themselves emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid gzugs rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is itself forms.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental objects are not one thing,🔽and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: emptiness is not one thing,

original: chos rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽chos rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te / chos rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and mental objects another.🔽Mental objects are themselves emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid chos rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid chos rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is itself mental objects.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, the eye constituent is not one thing,🔽and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: emptiness is not one thing,

original: mig gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin te /🔽mig gi khams nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin te / mig gi khams nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and the eye constituent another.🔽The eye constituent is itself emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid mig gi khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mig gi khams so //
translated: Emptiness is itself the eye constituent.

original: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang gzhan la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang gzhan la /
translated: emptiness is not one thing, and the eye constituent another.🔽The eye constituent itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is the eye constituent.🔽In the same way, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind constituents are not one thing, and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin te / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: emptiness is not one thing, and the thinking mind constituent another.

original: stong pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The thinking mind constituent itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is the thinking mind constituent.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: In the same way, the constituents of sights, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena are not one thing, and emptiness another;🔽emptiness is not one thing, and the constituents of mental phenomena another.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: The constituents of mental phenomena themselves are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the constituents of mental phenomena.🔽In the same way, the constituents of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind are not one thing, and emptiness another;

original: 'phags @372b pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phags @372b pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: emptiness is not one thing, and the constituents of the thinking mind another.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The constituents of the thinking mind itself are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the constituents of the thinking mind.🔽In the same way, the constituents of sights, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena are not one thing, and emptiness another;🔽emptiness is not one thing, and the constituents of mental phenomena another.

original: stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: The constituents of mental phenomena themselves are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the constituents of mental phenomena.

original: de bzhin du ma rig pa'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma rig pa'ang gzhan la /
translated: In the same way, the constituents of the earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are not one thing, and emptiness another;

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: emptiness is not one thing, and the constituents of the consciousness element another.🔽The constituents of the consciousness element itself are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the constituents of the consciousness element.🔽In the same way, the constituents of ignorance, the constituents of ending ignorance, and emptiness are not one thing, and emptiness another.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: Emptiness is not one thing,

original: ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and ignorance another.🔽Ignorance itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ma rig pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is ignorance.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on up to:

original: rga shi'i bar yang gzhan la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi'i bar yang gzhan la / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: aging and death are not one thing,🔽and emptiness another.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: Emptiness is not one thing,

original: rga shi'i bar yang gzhan ma yin te /🔽rga shi nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar yang gzhan ma yin te / rga shi nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: and aging and death another.🔽Aging and death themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid rga shi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rga shi'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is aging and death.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽that which is emptiness

original: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: is not produced and does not cease.

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin no //🔽de la ni 'grib pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin no // de la ni 'grib pa med do //
translated: It is not defiled and is not purified.

original: 'phel ba med do //🔽'das pa ma yin /🔽ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phel ba med do // 'das pa ma yin / ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: It does not decrease and does not increase.🔽It is not past, future, or present.

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not internal or external,🔽and it is not in between.

original: de la ni gzugs med do //
analyzed: de la ni gzugs med do //
translated: It is not form,

original: tshor ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med do //
translated: not feeling,

original: 'du shes med do //
analyzed: 'du shes med do //
translated: not perception,

original: 'du byed rnams med do //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams med do //
translated: not volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: and not consciousness.

original: de la ni mig med do //
analyzed: de la ni mig med do //
translated: There is no eye there.

original: rna ba med do //🔽sna med do //
analyzed: rna ba med do // sna med do //
translated: There is no ear there.🔽There is no nose there.

original: lce med do //
analyzed: lce med do //
translated: There is no tongue there.

original: lus med do //
analyzed: lus med do //
translated: There is no body there.

original: yid med do //
analyzed: yid med do //
translated: There is no mind there.

original: gzugs rnams med do //
analyzed: gzugs rnams med do //
translated: There are no forms there.

original: sgra rnams med do //🔽dri rnams med do //
analyzed: sgra rnams med do // dri rnams med do //
translated: There are no sounds there.🔽There are no smells there.

original: ro rnams med do //
analyzed: ro rnams med do //
translated: There are no tastes there.

original: reg rnams med do //
analyzed: reg rnams med do //
translated: There are no touches there.

original: chos rnams med do //
analyzed: chos rnams med do //
translated: There are no dharmas there.

original: de la ni mig gi khams med do //
analyzed: de la ni mig gi khams med do //
translated: There is no eye constituent there.

original: gzugs kyi khams med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams med do //
translated: There is no form constituent there.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //🔽rna ba'i khams @373a *//
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do // rna ba'i khams @373a *//
translated: There is no eye consciousness constituent there.🔽There is no ear constituent there.

original: med do // sgra'i khams med do //
analyzed: med do // sgra'i khams med do //
translated: There is no sound constituent there.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
translated: There is no ear consciousness constituent there.

original: sna'i khams med do //
analyzed: sna'i khams med do //
translated: There is no nose constituent there.

original: dri'i khams med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: dri'i khams med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
translated: There is no smell constituent there.🔽There is no nose consciousness constituent there.

original: lce'i khams med do //
analyzed: lce'i khams med do //
translated: There is no tongue constituent there.

original: ro'i khams med do //
analyzed: ro'i khams med do //
translated: There is no taste constituent there.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
translated: There is no tongue consciousness constituent there.

original: lus kyi khams med do //
analyzed: lus kyi khams med do //
translated: There is no body constituent there.

original: reg bya'i khams med do //
analyzed: reg bya'i khams med do //
translated: There is no touch constituent there.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
translated: There is no body consciousness constituent there.

original: yid kyi khams med do //
analyzed: yid kyi khams med do //
translated: There is no thinking-mind constituent there.

original: chos kyi khams med do //
analyzed: chos kyi khams med do //
translated: the element of mental objects does not exist;

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //🔽de la ni sdug bsngal med do //🔽kun 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do // de la ni sdug bsngal med do // kun 'byung ba med do //
translated: the element of mental consciousness does not exist.🔽There is no suffering in it.🔽There is no origination of suffering in it.

original: 'gog pa med do //
analyzed: 'gog pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of suffering in it.

original: lam med do //🔽de la ni ma rig pa med do //
analyzed: lam med do // de la ni ma rig pa med do //
translated: There is no path in it.🔽There is no ignorance in it.

original: ma rig pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of ignorance in it.

original: 'du byed rnams med do //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams med do //
translated: There are no volitions in it.

original: 'du byed 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of volitions in it.

original: rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no consciousness in it.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of consciousness in it.

original: ming dang gzugs med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med do //
translated: There is no name-and-form in it.

original: ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of name-and-form in it.

original: skye mched drug med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug med do //
translated: There are no six sense spheres in it.

original: skye mched drug 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of the six sense spheres in it.

original: reg pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa med do //
translated: There is no contact in it.

original: reg pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of contact in it.

original: tshor ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling in it.

original: tshor ba 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of feeling in it.

original: sred pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa med do //
translated: There is no craving in it.

original: sred pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of craving in it.

original: len pa med do //
analyzed: len pa med do //
translated: There is no grasping in it.

original: len pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: len pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of grasping in it.

original: srid pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa med do //
translated: There is no becoming in it.

original: srid pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of becoming in it.

original: skye ba med do //
analyzed: skye ba med do //
translated: There is no birth in it.

original: skye ba 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of birth in it.

original: de la ni rga shi med do //
analyzed: de la ni rga shi med do //
translated: there is no old age and death.

original: rga shi 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi 'gag pa med do //
translated: There is no cessation of old age and death.

original: de la ni 'thob pa med do //
analyzed: de la ni 'thob pa med do //
translated: There is no attainment.

original: mngon par @373b rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par @373b rtogs pa med do //
translated: There is no clear realization.

original: de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa med do //
analyzed: de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa med do //
translated: There is no stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: There is no fruit of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med do //
translated: There is no once-returner.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: There is no fruit of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba med do //
translated: There is no non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: There is no fruit of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa med do //
translated: There is no arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med do //🔽rang byang chub med do //🔽rang sangs rgyas med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med do // rang byang chub med do // rang sangs rgyas med do //
translated: There is no fruit of arhatship.🔽There is no individual enlightenment.🔽There is no pratyekabuddha.

original: de la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med do //
analyzed: de la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med do //
translated: There is no perfect buddha.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do //
translated: There is no perfect awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o //
translated: a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom in that way is said to be diligent.”

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am /
translated: they do not see the perfection of wisdom as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson pa'am /
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity, the perfection of conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, or the perfection of concentration as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la brtson pa'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not see the applications of mindfulness as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same vein, they do not see , up to and including the noble eightfold path, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas as being either engaged or not engaged.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽@374a *// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / @374a *// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson pa'am /
translated: In the same vein,

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson pa'am /
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson pa'am /
translated: he does not consider whether or not he is endeavoring in the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider whether or not he is endeavoring in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who are diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be diligent.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who are diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom in this manner

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no //
translated: are close to omniscience.

original: de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The more he approaches the knowledge of all modes, the more he will attain the purification of body, the purification of speech, the purification of mind, and the purification of the attributes.

original: de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob pa de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob pa de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: The more he attains the purification of body, the purification of speech, the purification of mind, and the purification of the attributes, the more he will not produce a thought associated with greed.

original: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: Similarly, he will not produce a thought associated with hatred, a thought associated with confusion,

original: nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang ldan @374b ba'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang ldan @374b ba'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: a thought associated with pride, a thought associated with deceit, a thought associated with avarice, a thought associated with envy, or a thought associated with any of the views.

original: des 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed cing /
analyzed: des 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed cing /
translated: He does not give rise to a mind of desire.

original: de bzhin du lta ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du lta ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye ste /
translated: In the same way, he does not give rise to a mind that is associated with any view, and so he is never born in a womb.

original: rtag tu rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is always born miraculously.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o //
translated: Except in order to ripen beings, he is never born in the lower realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
translated: He goes from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la /
translated: He ripens beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /
translated: He purifies the buddhafields.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And until he has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood, he is never separated from the lord buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi 'dor bar rtag tu de ltar brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi 'dor bar rtag tu de ltar brtson par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings who want to attain those qualities and benefits should not give up their efforts in this perfection of wisdom. They should always be making efforts like that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di lta ste /
translated: this bodhisattva great beings’ yoga—

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: namely, the yoga of emptiness—is the best.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad zil gyis mnan nas gnas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad zil gyis mnan nas gnas so //
translated: this bodhisattva great beings’ yoga of practicing the perfection of wisdom outshines all other yogas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @375a *//
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @375a *//
translated: Śāriputra,

original: po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni /
translated: bodhisattva great beings who stand in this yoga

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: He accomplishes the ten powers of the Tathagata,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: the four grounds of self-confidence, the four analytical knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “ Sariputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni /
translated: the bodhisattva-mahasattva who practices this yoga

original: nam yang ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: nam yang ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: never arouses a thought of stinginess,

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / rnam par g-yengs pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: never arouses a thought of immorality, a thought of anger, a thought of laziness, a thought of distraction, or a thought of stupidity.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra, the venerable Mahā­maudgalyāyana, the venerable Subhūti, the venerable Mahākāśyapa, the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyani­putra,

original: de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong mngon par grags pa rab tu mang po dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong mngon par grags pa rab tu mang po dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and many other very well-known monks, bodhisattva mahāsattvas, upāsakas, and upāsikās said this to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so //
translated: this perfection of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas is great.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' @375b sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' @375b sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba /
translated: this perfection of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas is vast,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog /
translated: the supreme perfection,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa rab mchog /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa / pha rol tu phyin pa rab mchog /
translated: the superior perfection,🔽the supreme perfection,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa /
translated: the unsurpassed perfection,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags te /
translated: the unexcelled perfection.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: this perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
translated: is the perfection of bodhisattva great beings, equal to the unequaled,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dul ba /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dul ba / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa /
translated: the peaceful, disciplined perfection,🔽the perfection empty of its own mark,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: the perfection of the empty nature of non-existent things,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rgyas pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rgyas pa /
translated: the perfection fully expanded with all good qualities,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
translated: the perfection endowed with all good qualities,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa mi rdzi ba nyid lags so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa mi rdzi ba nyid lags so //
translated: the perfection of invincibility.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal ba /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal ba / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: who give unequaled gifts,🔽who perfect unequaled generosity,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: who perfect the perfection of unequaled generosity,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob pa /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob pa /
translated: who attain unequaled bodies,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thob pa rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thob pa rnams kyis ni /
translated: who attain unequaled dharmas,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: attain this,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid lags so //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid lags so // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: namely, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sbyin pa'i pha @376a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha @376a *//
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang de bzhin du bgyi'o //
analyzed: rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang de bzhin du bgyi'o //
translated: just as it is taught in the perfection of generosity, so it is in the perfection of wisdom up to the perfection of generosity.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
translated: The Lord too, having practiced this perfection of wisdom, has attained the unequalled dharmas.

original: de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur lags so //
translated: Thus he has attained the unequalled form, feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness.

original: de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags so //
translated: Thus he has turned the unequalled Dharma-wheel.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang /
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang /
translated: The past Buddhas, the Lords,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
translated: having practiced this perfection of wisdom, have attained the unequalled dharmas.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so //
translated: They have turned the unequalled Dharma-wheel.

original: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang /
translated: The future Buddhas, the Lords,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so //
translated: Having practiced this perfection of wisdom, they have attained the Dharma that is equal to the unequaled.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so //
translated: they have turned the wheel of the Dharma that is equal to the unequaled.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: de ltar lags pas na /
analyzed: de ltar lags pas na /
translated: it is so.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu @376b mchi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu @376b mchi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bgyi'o //
translated: Therefore, bodhisattva great beings who wish to reach the other side of all phenomena should practice the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽shes ldan dag /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // shes ldan dag /
translated: When this was said, the Transcendent Victor said to those great hearers and those bodhisattva great beings, “Wise ones,

original: rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te /
translated: sons of noble family, it is so.

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as it is.

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: Wise ones,

original: rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: “Sons of noble family, it is just as you have said.

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

original: rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no //
translated: “Sons of noble family, those bodhisattva great beings who abide in this yoga of the perfection of wisdom are worthy of homage from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines,

original: rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
translated: this is the fourth chapter, “The Yoga.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the Blessed One,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes de skad ces bka' stsal na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes de skad ces bka' stsal na /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who abide in this yoga of the perfection of wisdom are worthy of homage.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de dag dang rtag tu ma bral bar gnas pa /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de dag dang rtag tu ma bral bar gnas pa / 'di lta ste /
translated: They are always inseparable from the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags /
translated: What is the dharma called a bodhisattva?

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽byang chub sems dpa' zhes @377a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' zhes @377a *//
translated: It is like this:

original: bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o //🔽de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: I do not see that dharma called a bodhisattva.🔽The Lord said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
analyzed: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
translated: Is form a bodhisattva?🔽”

analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / ma lags so; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: He replied, “No, Lord.

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: Śāradvatīputra, what do you think?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam / gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: or feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is a bodhisattva?”

original: ma lags so //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “No, they are not, Lord.”

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
translated: are the eyes a bodhisattva?”

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “No, they are not, Lord.”

analyzed: gzugs rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
translated: are sights a bodhisattva?”

original: ma lags so //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “No, they are not, Lord.”

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: Are the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear-consciousness constituent a bodhisattva?”

original: ma lags so //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: ma lags so //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: ma lags so // sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dvags kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o ////

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: byang chub @399a *//
analyzed: byang chub @399a *//

analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes de skad zer ba'ang /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The Dharma does not see the Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the Dharma does not see the expanse of reality.🔽The form element does not see the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The expanse of reality does not see the form element.

original: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis kyang chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis kyang chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Similarly, the expanse of reality does not see the other elements, up to and including the consciousness element, and the other elements, up to and including the consciousness element, do not see the expanse of reality.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The expanse of reality does not see the eye element.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo; ;chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: up to and the element of the mental faculty do not see the realm of phenomena.🔽The realm of phenomena does not see the element of the eye consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par @399b rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par @399b rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The element of the eye consciousness does not see the realm of phenomena.🔽Up to the element of the mental consciousness does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the element of the mental consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,🔽the compounded element does not see the uncompounded element,

original: 'dus byas kyi khams kyis 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams kyis 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: 'dus byas la ma gtogs par 'dus ma byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus la /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la ma gtogs par yang 'dus byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus so //

analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: gal te chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /

analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags mod kyi /

analyzed: 'on kyang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: in the same way, the meaning of the bodhisattva in the bodhisattva great being abiding in the perfection of wisdom has no basis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi bar la gzhi'i don med do //
