analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, there is no basis for the bodhisattva in the bodhisattva’s Great Vehicle.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do //
translated: For example, Subhūti, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, has no basis for the practice of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on, in the same vein as before.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la @401b gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la @401b gzhi'i don med do //
translated: He has no basis for the practice of the emptiness of external phenomena, and so on, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattva great being who is established in the perfection of wisdom has no basis for the bodhisattva.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu; dper na /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu; dper na /
translated: Śāriputra, for example,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gzhi med do //
translated: the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, has no basis for the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on, in the same vein as before.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang gzhi med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang gzhi med do //
translated: He has no basis for the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: In the same way, Śāradvatī­putra, the bodhisattvas who abide in the transcendent perfection of wisdom do not consider the meaning of the term ‘bodhisattva.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: dper na / 'dus byas kyi khams la /
analyzed: dper na / 'dus byas kyi khams la /
translated: for example, the element of the conditioned

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do //
translated: does not consider the meaning of the term ‘element of the unconditioned.’

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams la /
translated: The element of the unconditioned

original: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do //
translated: does not consider the meaning of the term ‘element of the conditioned.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas who abide in the transcendent perfection of wisdom do not consider the meaning of the term ‘bodhisattva.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: dper na / skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: for example, non-arising does not consider the meaning of the term ‘non-arising.’

original: de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no basis for non-cessation, non-conditioning, non-arising, non-apprehension, non-affliction, and non-purification.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i @402a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i @402a *//
translated: in the same way, there is no basis for the bodhisattva, the great being, abiding in the perfection of wisdom.

original: don med do //
analyzed: don med do //
translated: There is no basis for the bodhisattva.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhi ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhi ma mchis pa lags /
translated: what is the basis for non-arising?

original: gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags /
translated: What is the basis for non-affliction, up to non-purification?”

original: gang gi rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gang gi rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the non-arising of form is groundless.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, the non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is groundless.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each,

original: gzugs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzhi med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzhi med do //
translated: up to the non-affliction and non-purification of form is groundless.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, the non-affliction and non-purification of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is groundless.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig gi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: mig gi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the non-arising, non-affliction, and non-purification of the eyes is groundless.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: Likewise, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are without basis in the absence of production, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: yid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: yid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the mental faculty is without basis in the absence of production, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification.

original: de bzhin @402b du mig gi khams kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin @402b du mig gi khams kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: The sensory element of the eyes, the sensory element of sights, and the sensory element of visual consciousness are without basis in the absence of production, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness are without basis in the absence of production, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification.

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, the non-arising, the non-affliction, and the non-purification of the applications of mindfulness have no basis.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the non-arising, the non-affliction, and the non-purification of , up to and including the noble eightfold path, have no basis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: for example, the non-arising, the non-affliction, and the non-purification of the ten powers of the tathāgatas have no basis.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the non-arising, the non-affliction, and the non-purification of , up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, have no basis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med pa yin no //
translated: Thus, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great being’s basis for the meaning of bodhisattva is nonexistent.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: dper na / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
translated: for example, the four applications of mindfulness are extremely pure and have no basis.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
translated: up to the eightfold noble path is extremely pure and has no basis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin du @403a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du @403a *//
translated: in the same way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do ////
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do ////
translated: the bodhisattva great being’s basis for the meaning of bodhisattva is nonexistent.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: Noble Mahāyāna Sūtra of the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: bam po drug pa /
analyzed: bam po drug pa /
translated: Fascicle Six

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
translated: for example, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are extremely pure and have no basis.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are utterly pure in the absence of any basis.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas, great beings, who abide in the transcendent perfection of wisdom, have no basis for the bodhisattva level.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: dper na / bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do //
translated: for example, the self is utterly pure in the absence of any basis, owing to the fact that it is devoid of self.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med pa'i phyir sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / byed pa po dang /
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med pa'i phyir sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / byed pa po dang /
translated: from the absence of an agent up to the absence of an observer, sentient beings, living organisms, living creatures, individuals, humankind, human beings, one who acts, and one who makes others act, are utterly pure in the absence of any basis.

original: slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: There is no basis for the one who gives, the one who receives, the one who gives up, the one who instigates, the one who feels, the one who causes to feel, the one who knows, or the one who sees, because they are utterly pure.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: Śāradvatī­putra, in the same way, there is no such thing as a bodhisattva level for a bodhisattva great being who abides in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i @403b bu; dper na /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i @403b bu; dper na /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra, it is as follows:

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do //
translated: when the orb of the sun rises, there is no basis for darkness.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, there is no such thing as a bodhisattva level for a bodhisattva great being who abides in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de bzhin du bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi med do //
translated: in the same way, when the eon of conflagration occurs, there is no basis for all that is compounded.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do //
translated: in the same way, for the bodhisattva great beings who abide in the perfection of wisdom, there is no basis for the bodhisattva’s meaning.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do //
translated: for example, for the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha, there is no basis for immorality in the aggregate of morality.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sems rnam par g-yeng ba'i gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sems rnam par g-yeng ba'i gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no basis for distraction in the aggregate of meditative stability.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi phung po la 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi phung po la 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no basis for immorality in the aggregate of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no basis for non-liberation in the aggregate of liberation.

original: de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do //
translated: Likewise, there is no basis for the aggregate of seeing the pristine wisdom of liberation other than the pristine wisdom of liberation.
